Dear Shankar/Wajid 

 

I hope you are doing well.

 

As discussed earlier today, I urgently need your support in providing the revised quote by tomorrow before noon for the L’Occitane Dubai Mall facade repair works. Upon receiving your quote, I need to update both the brand and mall management, as the existing cracked wall poses a serious safety hazard, with a risk of falling and causing injuries.

 

For your reference, I have attached the relevant drawings and outlined the scope of work below:

 

Scope of Work:

1. Removal of the existing damaged wall and proper disposal of debris.

2. Supply and installation of a new wall with adequate structural support.

3. Supply and installation of brand-supplied tiles (20cm x 0.5cm) to replace the existing tiles (300cm x 10cm).

 

Please prioritize this request and let me know if you need any further details. Your prompt response will be highly appreciated.

 

Best regards

Dear Shankar/Wajid 

 

I hope you are doing well.

 

As discussed earlier today, I urgently need your support in providing the revised quote by tomorrow before noon for the L’Occitane Dubai Mall facade repair works. Upon receiving your quote, I need to update both the brand and mall management, as the existing cracked wall poses a serious safety hazard, with a risk of falling and causing injuries.

 

For your reference, I have attached the relevant drawings and outlined the scope of work below:

 

Scope of Work:

1. Removal of the existing damaged wall and proper disposal of debris.

2. Supply and installation of a new wall with adequate structural support.

3. Supply and installation of brand-supplied tiles (20cm x 0.5cm) to replace the existing tiles (300cm x 10cm).
